The Arizona Daily Star's endorsements for 2024  —  Editor's note:  —  The Star's endorsements are coming late in the cycle this year, for a host of reasons, but the bottom line is we still believe in a community newspaper's role in endorsing candidates for election and we were determined to fill that role.
